entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
